reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress nice for fall and appreciate its style. However, the material quality and thickness receive negative feedback, with customers describing it as poor and thin. Moreover, the fit receives mixed reviews, with some finding the length perfect while others report issues with the neckline. Additionally, comfort is also mixed, with some finding it comfortable while one customer describes it as itchy. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft, lightweight but warm enough
items.body: This is a lovely dress, soft and swingy, and not heavy sweater fabric like some sweater dresses. I will need either a camisole or a safety pin since the crossover reveals too much. I am keeping it because it will be a great dress for fall and winter. Fit was perfect for me in length. I am short, so this would probably be a shorter length for average women, but I like the length as it is. Read more
items.author: Debbie

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Immediate return
items.body: This was an immediate return. It looks more or less like the picture, but the fabric feels (and looks) cheap and itchy. Its far frumpier in person than it looks in the pictures. Read more
items.author: Maddison

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice dress for fall
items.body: I really like the fit of this dress. I purchased a medium and I am 5’5” and 141 lbs. I will wear a camisole under it because the neckline is too low for me. It seems warm enough for cool weather and that was what I was looking for. Read more
items.author: Love to Travel

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Loved this dress!
items.body: Wore this for family photos and it feels like the holidays!! So comfortable! Read more
items.author: rachel

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stretchy Warm Dress
items.body: Stylish and figure flattering dress. The material is stretchy and warm for comfort. Thisndress is easy to accessorize with for different events. I'm 5'3 and the dress comes doen to just at my knee. It wears well with a tall boot for the colder months. Read more
items.author: Misty Powell

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Not good sizing or quality
items.body: Material thin and see through, large fits more like a medium. Not a true wrap dress. Will be returning. Read more
items.author: Becky

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great maroon wrap dress
items.body: This maroon dress is a great find! The color is rich and works well for both casual and slightly dressier occasions. It is so soft and light weight, which makes it perfect for a warmer environment without feeling heavy or clingy. The ribbed knit fabric has just the right amount of stretch, and it's not see-through, which makes it easy to wear without worry. It is very flattering, with the wrap style and removable belt giving a nice shape that highlights the waist. TTS! The wrap is nice and not too low cut, which means that I can teach in it without feeling uncomfortable. The dress itself is a decent length on me, but I am very short, so it may hit differently depending on your height. It looked so cute with knee high boots, and I can also see it working well with heels or flats. I love this dress because it feels both chic and comfortable. It's a great summer to fall transition piece that layers easily with a coat or accessories. Lastly, I'm rating this 5-stars because I would definitely get this again. Read more
items.author: AmazonCustomerCK

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars See through
items.body: This was very pretty. Not well made, very thin. but you get what you pay for. The dress would have to have a slip under it unless you don’t mind the Diana Spenser look. (Reference only for people over fifty) Read more
items.author: j. sole

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Purple, Yellow, Burgundy, Apricot, Black, Coffee, Navy Blue, Orange, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
